Articles.Content:
Post an opinion about something, then the next person posts a pic invalidating that argument! I\'ll start.

Ponies are awesome!

I have to agree, but the show was designed for girls ages 4-10, and any male older than that ratio is frowned upon in society.

Team Fortress 2 is ruining itself.
Parachutes only work for set amounts of time before breaking off, and will likely be destroyed either by thrust, time, or moving prograde.
FYI, The invalidation has to have a picture, with the caption 'Your argument is invalid!'. You need at least that, and a a new opinion.
